sense.name: a resource allocated to some purpose, usually money
sense.examples: Bill's budget for dining out may be more restricted than ours. The budget of firewood will probably only last another week at this rate. Mary keeps her weekly household budget in a cookie jar in the kitchen. John went over the weekly budget of carbohydrates allowed by his new diet.

sense.name: a formal plan of intended expenditures
sense.examples: The President will submit his budget to Congress next week. That budget will never pass the Senate. The accountant is reviewing the firm's annual operating budget. The budget deficit is projected to grow next year. There will be budget cuts in healthcare and education.
